summary: My first attempt at making a mod for Skyrim. A small set of four swords; Valkyrie's Blood, Valkyrie's Fire, Valkyrie's Frost, and Valkyrie's Storm.
descriptionHtml:
My first attempt at making a mod for Skyrim. A small set of four swords; Valkyrie's Blood, Valkyrie's Fire, Valkyrie's Frost, and Valkyrie's Storm.

This is inteaded to be the beginnings of a weapon and armour set for Spellswords and Witchblades. Each sword use the same model and similar textures, however they include different enchantments for each.

Valkyrie's Blood: Absorbs 25 points of health for 5 seconds. Absorbs 30 points of magicka for 5 seconds.

Valkyrie's Fire: Does 37 points of health damage for 5 seconds. Absorbs 37 points of magicka for 5 seconds.

Valkyrie's Frost: Does 30 points of health/stamina damage for 5 seconds. Absorbs 30 points of magicka for 5 seconds. (These values were intead to be 25 points, however the game keeps setting them at 31 points).

Valkyrie's Fire: Does 30 points of health/magicka damage for 5 seconds. Absorbs 30 points of magicka for 5 seconds.

Valkyrie's Sword: A basic sword without enchantments. For players who want to add their own flavor to combat.

Crafting:
-Valkyrie's Ingot: 1 Quicksilver Ore, 1 Silver Ore, 1 Grand Soul Gem (Grand).
-Valkyrie's Blood Sword: 1 Valkyrie's Ingot, 1 Leather Strips, 2 Vampire Dust.
-Valkyrie's Fire Sword: 1 Valkyrie's Ingot, 1 Leather Strips, 2 Fire Salts.
-Valkyrie's Frost Sword: 1 Valkyrie's Ingot, 1 Leather Strips, 2 Frost Salts.
-Valkyrie's Storm Sword: 1 Valkyrie's Ingot, 1 Leather Strips, 2 Void Salts.
-Valkyrie's Sword: 1 Valkyrie's Ingot, 1 Leather Strips.

This is my first mod, so any critics and/or suggestions are greatly appreciated. The more feedback I can get the better.


Updates:
-Added a "Valkyrie's Ingot" for use in crafting the swords.
-Added a new "Valkyrie's Sword" with no enchantments (blank slate for custom enchantments).
-Updated crafting recipes.
-Updated the enchantments.

Fixed Issues:
-Specular map has been added (no more super shinyness).
-Upgrading now works propperly.
-Swords are now listed under the "Steel" category.
-Replaced old textures with higher resolution and more aesthetic textures.

Current Known Issues:
-The swords still do not display propperly in the items menu.
-Valkyrie's Fire point values are set incorrectly. Valkyrie's Fire were set, the same as Frost and Storm, using the creation kit; however the in game the values are higher then they should be.

Planned Updates:
-Beta.1.1: "Titel in Progress". I have decided to incorporate these swords (or a variant of) into a new mod that I am currently working on. I won't be posting any details yet, however when the update is ready, the update will be uploaded onto its own mod page.
author: SarielEvriel
